hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select eooi.eooi_id, eooi.eooi_code, eooi.eooi_name from eo_order_item eooi where 1 = 1 <if !is_empty(goodName,goodCode)> and ( 1=2 <<or eooi.eooi_code LIKE '%' || :goodCode || '%'>> <<or eooi.eooi_name LIKE '%' || :goodName || '%'>> ) </if> <<and eooi.eooi_order_no = :orderNo>>
